appDesc.message: üîêüí∞Cryptocurrency wallet for Tezos blockchain as Web Extension for your Browser.

clickIconToResetPermissions.message: Click on the X icon to reset permissions.

clickToRevealOrEditField.message: Click to reveal or edit this field

delegatingMotivation.message: Delegating your funds to bakers is a great way of earning interest on your balance

depositToWalletDescription.message: Click on deposit method to get money on your wallet. Use faucet to get free coins!

contractNotAvailable.message: The contract at this address is not available. Does it exist on this network?

tokenDoesNotMatchStandard.message: Provided token contract doesn't match FA1.2 standard

addressOfDeployedTokenContract.message: Address of a deployed token contract.

tokenSymbolPatternDescription.message: Only a-z, A-Z, 0-9 chars allowed, 2-7 length

tokenSymbolInputDescription.message: Token symbol, like 'USD' for United States Dollar.

tokenNameInputDescription.message: Token name, like 'Bitcoin' for BTC asset.

decimalsInputDescription.message: A number of decimal places after point. For example: 8 for BTC, 2 for USD.

accountNameInputDescription.message: What will be the name of the new account?

delegationInfoWhileMessage.message: fetching or processing your delegation info

privateKeyInputDescription.message: The Secret key of the Account you want to import.

isPrivateKeyEncrypted.message: Your private key in encrypted format?

mnemonicInputDescription.message: Mnemonic. Your secret twelve word phrase.

passwordInputDescription.message: Used for additional mnemonic derivation. That is Not wallet password.

addDerivationPathPrompt.message: By default derivation isn't used. Click on 'Custom derivation path' to add it.

faucetFileInputPrompt.message: Drag & drop a file or select it manually by clicking on the area below. You can download it from

restoreWalletWithSeedPhrase.message: Restore your Wallet with Seed Phrase

accountAddressLabel.message: Your current account address. Share it to receive funds.

revealPrivateKeyDescription.message: Also known as "Export Account", reveals private key for your selected account.

revealSeedPhraseDescription.message: Also known as "Export Wallet", you may need this seed phrase to access your wallet and accounts on other devices.

dAppsDescription.message: In this section you can enable ability to interact with decentralized applications that support Thanos Wallet.

networksDescription.message: In this section you can add or delete custom Tezos networks.

activateAccountDescription.message: Use this section to activate your selected account by providing secret phrase. It may be necessary for ICO/Fundraiser or testnet faucet accounts.

removeAccountDescription.message: Use this section to remove your selected account. Only imported accounts can be removed.

aboutDescription.message: Use this section to view meta info about Thanos Wallet.

unlockPasswordInputDescription.message: A password is used to protect the wallet.

importNewAccountTitle.message: Restore Account? Want to sign in another?
